description.message: An extension that aims to improve upon the already great experience on AO3 by adding various additional features.

delete_currently_selected_preset_message.message: Are you sure you'd like to delete your "$1" preset?

preset_name_blank_warning.message: Your preset name cannot be blank

preset_name_already_exists_warning.message: A preset with the name "$1" already exists. Saving this preset will replace it.

cb_hide_html_footnote.message: Hide "Plain text with limited HTML" footnote

cb_focus_after_insert.message: Focus comment text area after insert

cb_recommendation.message: For easier commenting, you can enable a Floating Comment Box in the $1 settings

cb_insert_tooltip.message:
Inserts your current selection.

You can customise the default style of the inserted text in the AES settings.

enable_floating_comment_box_toolip.message: Turns the comment box into a floating window that stays with you as you read for easier commenting.

cb_floating_opacity_tooltip.message: Set how transparent the floating comment box will be when its text area is not focused.

cb_hide_comment_as_heading_tooltip.message: Hides the "Comment as <pseud>" heading in the comment box.

cb_hide_html_footnote_tooltip.message: Hides the "Plain text with limited HTML" footnote in the comment box.

cb_enable_additional_controls_tooltip.message: Enables an additional set of controls to make formatting your comments easier.

insert_selection_button_explanation.message: "Insert Selection" button (shown when Additional Controls are enabled)

cb_focus_after_insert_tooltip.message: Makes the $1 focus the comment text box after inserting your selection.

cb_insert_formatting_tooltip.message: Set what kind of formatting text added with the $1 will have when inserted.

enable_search_presets_tooltip.message: Enables the search presets fieldset on the search page.

enable_tag_collapse_tooltip.message: Makes it so excessive tags (any after the amount set in the Threshold below) are hidden by default.

tag_collapse_threshold_tooltip.message: Set how many tags are shown before additional ones they're collapsed and hidden by default.

enable_average_words_per_chapter_stat_to.message: Adds an "Average words per chapter" stat to works.

enable_estimated_reading_time_stat_toolt.message: Adds an "Estimated reading time" stat to works. This is calculated with the reading speed set below.

read_speed_tooltip.message: Set the amount of words-per-minute used to calculate "Estimated reading time" stats.

setting_requires_reload.message: You must reload the page for changes to this setting to take effect.

save_comments_to_storage_tooltip.message: Autosaves comments to your browser's storage.

reset_all_settings_tooltip.message: Resets all settings to their default values.

reset_all_data_tooltip.message: Reset all data for the extension.

reset_all_data_confirmation.message:
Are you sure you'd like to reset all of your data for this extension?

This action will delete all of your settings, search presets and saved comments.

hidden_aw_show_reasons_tooltip.message: Shows the reasons a work has been hidden when enabled.

hide_specific_authors_tooltip.message: Hides works by authors in your author hide list when enabled.

hide_specific_fandoms_tooltip.message: Hides works within fandoms in your fandom hide list when enabled.

hide_multiple_fandoms_tooltip.message: Hides works with multiple fandoms when enabled.

multiple_fandoms_threshold_tooltip.message: Sets the amount of fandoms required for crossover works to be hidden.

hide_specific_tags_threshold.message: Hides works with tags in your tag hide list when enabled.

settings_moved.message: The settings have moved to the new "$1" menu within the site's navbar.

ao3_hide_setting_note.message: Note: This setting being enabled will prevent $1 from hiding works based on their $2.

hidden_aw_quick_hide_key_tooltip.message: Set what method you'd like to use to quickly hide authors, fandoms and tags.

hidden_aw_max_rating_tooltip.message: Hides works that exceed the maximum rating

hidden_aw_consider_not_rated_explicit_to.message:
When enabled, works that are marked "Not Rated" will be considered explicit.

When disabled, these works will be shown regardless of the maximum rating.
